messageHandlers.script:

	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Race").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("SocialSecurityNumber").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Gender").props.params.SelectedValue
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("DeceasedDate").props.params.date = None
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("MiddleName").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("Nickname").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("DateOfBirthQuality").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("Ethnicity").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("SSNQuality").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Family").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Family").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Family").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("RelationshipHousehold").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("ParticipantPhone").props.params.inputText = ""

	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("EmergencyName").props.params.inputText = ""

	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Extra").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("DisablingCondition").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Extra").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("VeteranStatus").props.params.SelectedValue = None

config.script:
import traceback
	import re
	project = "RITI"
	### Declare parameters 
 	
 	user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	case_manager_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.case_manager_id
	gender = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.gender
	first_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.first_name
	middle_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name
	last_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.last_name
	suffix_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.suffix_name
	nick_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name
	dob = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.dob
	ssn = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn
	dob_quality = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.dob_quality
	ssn_quality = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn_quality
	race = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.race
	ethnicity = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ethnicity
	disability = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.disability
	veteran = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.veteran
	participant_phone = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.participant_phone
	participant_email = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.participant_email
	emergency_contact_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_name
	emergency_contact_type = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_type
	emergency_contact_phone = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_phone
	emergency_contact_email = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_email
	
	
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if None in [case_manager_id,gender,first_name,last_name,dob,ssn,dob_quality,ssn_quality,race]:
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print('Null Error')
	elif int(case_manager_id) < 0:
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print('Case Manager ID Error')
	elif gender.strip() == "":
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
	elif first_name.strip() == "":
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print('First Name Error')
	elif last_name.strip() == "":
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print('Last Name Error')
	else:
		valid = True
	## Convert Phone number to numeric value only
	participant_phone = participant_phone.replace('(','')
	participant_phone = participant_phone.replace(')','')
	participant_phone = participant_phone.replace('-','')
	participant_phone = participant_phone.replace(' ','')
	emergency_contact_phone = emergency_contact_phone.replace('(','')
	emergency_contact_phone = emergency_contact_phone.replace(')','')
	emergency_contact_phone = emergency_contact_phone.replace('-','')
	emergency_contact_phone = emergency_contact_phone.replace(' ','')	
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		if len(ssn.replace('-','')):
			if len(ssn.replace('-','')) == 9 and ssn.replace('-','').isnumeric():
				validSsn = True
				ssnDB = ssn.replace('-','')
			else:
				validSsn = False
				ssnDB = None
		else:
			validSsn = True
			ssnDB = None
			
		if validSsn:
#			try:
			### Create transaction
			transactionFailed = False
			txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)
			try:
				#Insert the Human Data
				path = "Participants/Registration/Insert New Human"
				parameters = {"first_name":first_name,
							"middle_name":middle_name,
							"last_name":last_name,
							"suffix_name":suffix_name,
							"nick_name":nick_name,
							"dob":dob,
							"dob_quality":dob_quality,
							"gender":gender,
							"ethnicity":ethnicity,
							"race":race,
							"disability":disability,
							"veteran":veteran,
							"phone":participant_phone,
							"email":participant_email,
							"emergency_contact_name":emergency_contact_name,
							"emergency_contact_type":emergency_contact_type,
							"emergency_contact_phone":emergency_contact_phone,
							"emergency_contact_email":emergency_contact_email}
				human_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
				#
				#Insert the SSN
				path = "Participants/Registration/Insert New Human SSN"
				parameters = {"humanId":human_id,
							 "ssn":ssnDB, 
							 "ssnQuality":ssn_quality}
				system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId)
				#
				#Insert the new participant data
				path = "Participants/Registration/InsertNewParticipant"
				parameters = {"human_id":human_id,
							"case_manager_id":case_manager_id}
				participant_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
				#
				#Insert an entry in the Intake Log
				path = "Participants/Registration/Insert New Participant Intake"
				parameters = {"user_name":user_name}
				intake = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
				#
				#Enroll in the Hope University and Guest House programs
				#Hope University is program #29
				path = "Participants/Enrollments/ParticipantAddSelectedEnrollments"
				parameters = {"participantId":participant_id,"programId":29}
				enrollment = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
				#Guest House is program #47
				path = "Participants/Enrollments/ParticipantAddSelectedEnrollments"
				parameters = {"participantId":participant_id,"programId":47}
				enrollment = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
			except:
				transactionFailed = True
				logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants RegisterParticipantPartial Button Save")
				msg = traceback.format_exc()
				logger.error(msg)
				
			### Check if an error occured rollback the transaction
			if transactionFailed:
				system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")
				Refresh = 0
			### Otherwise commit 
			else:
				system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Participant Added Successfully")
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshParticipants", payload={}, scope="session")
				self.view.params.ParticipantId = -1
				system.perspective.closeDock("RegisterParticipantPartial")
			### Always close the transaction	
			system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
				
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please enter a valid Social Security Number before saving.")	
	else:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please fill in all the mandatory fields correctly before saving.")

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False
